description:
☀️Now featuring day/night cycle!🌙 Customizable, make sure to check user properties!

[h1][b]Please make sure to rate, favorite or award if you like my content![/b][/h1]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198098298396/myworkshopfiles/?appid=431960&sort=score&browsefilter=myfiles&view=imagewall][h1][b]A follow is also appreciated.[/b][/h1][/url]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/E1CtLtt.gif[/img]

Persona 3 Reload x Sea Paradise Collaboration art. I animated this to celebrate the release of the remake.

[h3]👨‍🎨 Artist:[/h3] ©ATLUS ©SEGA All rights reserved.
[h3]🎨 Image Source:[/h3] https://twitter.com/realjudoippon/status/1735574586866155893
[h3]🎵 Music:[/h3] 
Full Moon Full Life
Color Your Night
Changing Seasons -Reload-
Joy
Memories of You -Reload-
Want To Be Close -Reload-
When The Moon's Reaching Out Stars -Reload-
Tranquility -Reload-
Iwatodai Dorm -Reload-
I Will Protect You -Reload-
Memories of the School
It's Going Down Now
Disconnected
Brand New Days -The Beginning-
Brand New Days -Reload-
Don't
[h3][b][No plans currently to add tracks from the original Persona 3. Requests will likely be ignored][/b][/h3]

[h3]🔊 Train Ambience SFX:[/h3] https://www.zapsplat.com/music/interior-train-ambience-very-few-people-distant-chatter-circle-line-sydney-metro-australia/
[h3]🔠 Font:[/h3] Baqacents Semi Bold and DINEngschrift

[h3]Tags:[/h3] Desktop, Live Wallpaper, animated, 4K, anime, game, JRPG, Atlus, PERSONA, Makoto Yuki, monorail, train, subway, city, sleeping, media, mp3, clock, date

[h1]---[/h1]
I do not own the original artwork or the music. Please support the official artist(s).
[u][b]Please do not rehost elsewhere without giving proper credit.[/b][/u]
title: Persona 3 Reload [4K + Day/Night cycle]
